import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./Nav.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Nav(){const[show,handleShow]=useState(false);// When scroll is a 100px (down in page) we add the navbar visibilty and if not remove visibility on navbar
